text:
I have shared this is the situation you unilaterally created by refusing me the slightest insight into the situation. So I can not address. And because I
stand by what I say, I will attach it again here for reference.
Note that I am still all in on a mutually agreeable path forward with Dr Brown even though you have rejected every piece of her advice or
recommendations to date. Let’s just be on the same page because you have proven over and over to manipulate both therapist, our narrative, and in
the end, the output.
Specifically, for tomorrow I’ll ask Elsa over as well to help me around here. It’s not because I need the supervision of the young woman I raised and
walked down the aisle. It’s because I do not want a fight.
Most important is that I show Adrian he is not banned from his life here so he stops the incredibly destructive “self-blame” he is left to wallow in
today.
I hope a chaperoned visit sounds like a reasonable compromise and assures your concerns are met.
Message 676 of 4024
I do not agree. We do not have 50/50.
Please go to your lawyer and we can work through them and the courts.
Sent:01/23/2024 at 10:28 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/23/2024 at 10:29 AM)
Subject:Re: AD Basketball today
Message 677 of 4024
Let’s break this up into a couple pieces please:
- Wednesday- can we have the chaperoned visit as discussed below? Even a court would award that.
- 50/50 Custody- I’ll pause because that is news to me. If I don’t have legal custody please share
Thanks!
Sent:01/23/2024 at 10:31 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/23/2024 at 10:44 AM)
Subject:Re: AD Basketball today
Message 678 of 4024
Let’s go to court and get this sorted once and for all. I am making arrangements to talk to my lawyer.
Cancelling plans to talk at 12:30 today. It does not feel safe nor will it be documented.
Communications will be strictly on OFW.
I will not respond in evenings and during times expected parties to be asleep. Immediately response is not also required or expected.
Sent:01/23/2024 at 10:48 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/23/2024 at 11:07 AM)
Subject:Re: AD Basketball today
